website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight floating hammock that can fold down to slightly larger than pocket-size.
pros: This floating hammock is made from a lightweight nylon fabric and comes with 2 pillows that you insert in either end and inflate
It is roughly 4 feet long and is designed to support you from your head to your knees and has a 250 pound weight limit
cons: This unit requires some assembly, which, although not difficult to perform, can be slightly more frustrating than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Order double, everybody will wanna use them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I’m very happy with my purchase. They arrived quickly and so far, we’ve had no quality issues. I bought them for hubby and I....we don’t even get to use them bc the kids are fighting over who gets to lay on them. Mind you, they have 50-11 other floats. Sigh* Sidenote: These are perfect to deflate and pack for tropical vacations. They’re stronger than I expected. My husband is a big guy 6ft @250lbs and I see no signs of a struggle keeping him afloat. LOL:)
customer_reviews.author: Jlovely4

customer_reviews.title: Great product fits in your beach bag and can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product fits in your beach bag and can be taken anywhere. Dries very quickly. I did not need the air pump however it came free with the product. Easy to assemble easy to disassemble. Many people I know use days as I live in Florida. I have seen mariti variations of this product but by far this one is the most washable and easily transportable.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Raft
customer_reviews.text: Raft material is made well. It's a very strong plastic. It's weird to blow up. You have to put both blow up pillows into the raft first, then blow it up. It was hard to get the smaller pillow straight down to the other side. I used a ruler to help the pillow to make it to the other side. Overall, it has lasted me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Latkah

customer_reviews.title: Light and great for travel
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these floats!I was looking for something perfect for drifting around a Lazy River and these fit the bill. The floats are so flat they're easy to pack inflate and deflate rinse off and repack. I think if you were looking for a float that you're able to completely lay on your back and float on top of the water this is not the float for you. Me personally, was looking for a float that allowed me to be partly submerged in the water. I can't wait for the opportunity for us to be able to use these again!! Get your own, you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Travis (DJ Shaver) Rana

customer_reviews.title: Really like the convenience of this being smaller than a normal ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the convenience of this being smaller than a normal float. Easy to store and I was able to lay on my stomach...though not as comfortably. One note..insert the inflators prior to blowing up.... I had to deflate and start over...and they aren't easy to deflate!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Surprising comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a lark. Turned out to be great buy. Very comfortable. Wish it was just a bit longer as at 6'3" it is just a tad short for my frame. With that said, wifey loves it and it fits her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MarkR

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but no box!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome but it didn’t come in a box, just a weird plastic bag. I wanted to give as a gift but I really can’t. I’ll have to keep for myself and buy again from a different seller. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Better Than A Raft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and now in the summer he floats around on it instead of sitting on the couch. All I need to do now is find something for him to do in the winter to get him out of the house! Seriously, he loves this float and spends a lot of time lounging around on it in the pool. Everyone wants to use it. So, it looks like I will be ordering a few more. Personally, I like the multi-positions of sitting, reclining, and hanging of over it that are possible.
customer_reviews.author: Hadeel Giyarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: All the part came and it works like it should. Fun to use on trips and relaxing to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Ngo

customer_reviews.title: This floating device is for adults only.
customer_reviews.text: Great floating device when in a pool. Very relaxing & easy to get on & off. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Carideo

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This floatie takes up minimal space and is super comfortable as a chair or lounge. Also, a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Googstar

customer_reviews.title: This pool lounger is the bomb. also- its the ...
customer_reviews.text: This pool lounger is the bomb. also- its the bomb because IT CAME WITH AN AIR PUMP!!! I can now buy more giant pool floats!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lui

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I'm a big guy!
customer_reviews.text: It holds my fat ass and allows me to float comfortably. I love it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BrianK828

customer_reviews.title: Great Floats easy storage
customer_reviews.text: These are great floats for the pool can sit in them different directions and they don’t take up a lot of room for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best floaty out there
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best floaty out there. It allows you to stay below the water, which is key for me. I don't like the floats that are 100% above water, I want to be in the pool! Very sturdy, and durable. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: One of the hammocks seam broke.
customer_reviews.text: Still a good deal but needs some care on seams.
customer_reviews.author: SERGE The Grill Master

customer_reviews.title: Great to travel with....
customer_reviews.text: Great size to travel with... flattens to nothing and lightweight for suitcases when heading to beach destinations. Float will keep you half in half out of the water. For home pool use their are better choices.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Very Supportive
customer_reviews.text: This float is awesome! It floats well and seems to be great quality. It was a little hard to get the inflated pillows in each end but that could have been an operator error. I also thought it was a little expensive (it is just a little hammock with inflatable pillow in each end) but it really is comfortable and floats very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: ... of these 4 years ago and they are still perfect. I just bought 2 more since we built ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these 4 years ago and they are still perfect. I just bought 2 more since we built a pool. They are the most comfortable floats. Very, very durable. Portable and easy to transport in the car without deflating the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EZ to travel with!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! EZ for oversees traveling and storing. Made multiple people ask about them while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sroczyk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. We took them to Mexico, everyone wanted to know where we got them. My only concern is if I will be able to get replacement airtubes should the ones it comes with ever get a hole, which I am sure they eventually will. Also, the company could forgo the foot pumps and drop the price a little, not needed, at all. Overall very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monica H

customer_reviews.title: Hammock is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Hammock is great and allows us to float in pool. The pump is useless, we threw pump away.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Float made right!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and air tubes are not stretched from sitting on it like connected air tubes are. First one that has lasted longer than 1 season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lounging in the heat
customer_reviews.text: Just right for when you want to be mostly in the water but still lounging.
customer_reviews.author: BuyShoesFirst

customer_reviews.title: Love this lounger.
customer_reviews.text: Great lounger. Well made, drys fast, easy to transport. Took it to Cabo. LOVED IT.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is perfect for those hot days - you can lay and still be mostly in the water!
customer_reviews.author: JMontgo

customer_reviews.title: ... took very little space in our suitcases and were easy to pack back up and bring home
customer_reviews.text: We took these on vacation as they took very little space in our suitcases and were easy to pack back up and bring home. Loved that you floated but remained in the water some to help you stay cool. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bronner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and have used them several times ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and have used them several times in the pool. Very comfortable. May try them in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: LarryH

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: It's great for sitting in the water with each float on your sides
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Love the water hammock
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love the water hammock. Easy to put together and small enough to store them. Got 2!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to sit and read in
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to sit and read in. Comfy! When you move to the lounge, doubles as a pillow. Comp.act, easy to put in suitcase
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hot day
customer_reviews.text: Perfect floatie for a hot day when you want to be in the water. Compact, portable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Shianna

customer_reviews.title: Came with a leak
customer_reviews.text: Came with a leak on the larger float. Despite efforts can not find the leak. Have to blow up every time you use it, but it is a slow leak so usually can get by with it in the pool, just have to blow up next time. I am tired, however, of buying products with leaks. Wouldn’t recommend for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: achsah stremsterfer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this buy. The hammock cane without any inflatable pillows. So it’s a piece of fabric that is utterly useless. I don’t understand why they would advertise that it comes with two pillows and yet they send none. What a waste of my money! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ekaskal

customer_reviews.title: Submerging raft
customer_reviews.text: Great raft for when you want to be submerged in water.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Pucino

customer_reviews.title: On the fence / Off the fence
customer_reviews.text: Being In the Senior years we purchased two hammocks. First time out it took a little training to get in them. The plus is durability and you stay wet, but floating! We kinda like them kinda don’t. Overall good buy! Update: Used the hammocks today at the pool. Kept us in the water, but plenty of rays!☀️ Soon as you learn to climb into them the hammock becomes a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbolli

customer_reviews.title: it rocks your world
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors Easy peasy to put together. Fully equip. Perfectly priced and packaged. Spent the entire day on it floating on the lake a feeling of pure levitation. This is my new favorite product of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Antoinette Gliozzo Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Great pool float
customer_reviews.text: Love the pool float. So easy to put together & it comes with a hand pump. Also rolls up great for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: These are great. You can also deflate them easily for storage
customer_reviews.text: These are great. You can also deflate them easily for storage. The only negative would be the gadget they send to blow them up are worthless, but you can blow them up by yourself. Great product. Make sure you insert the floats before blowing them all the way up and then finish with the floats inserted. Definitely one of the better float options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars I would. It literally broke after being used for about 5 minutes. The stitching came apart and the inflatable tube floated away. I ordered it as a Christmas gift so now the return window is closed! It is complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Culver

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the pool!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool!! There are so many ways to use this and everyone loves using them! I even bought some for my mom who used ours and loved them! The heaviest guy was 200+ and worked great!! Easy storage too!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: The floats are Not Foam, they're Balloons.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting foam floats not flimsy blowup pillows. However, it does work and chair weave material is very durable and comfortable. The hand/foot pump is simple but very capable and (if taken care of) could be used for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sean E Willey

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable when they are inflated but the floats are very cheap and got a hole within an hour of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Took it on vacation and was pleasantly surprised how easy it was to pack and re-pack to go home. It seemed to loose air after I inflated it, but it still worked well with less than the maximum inflation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relax
customer_reviews.text: Very good to relax and float around the pool. Better if they were made here...
customer_reviews.author: yankee01

customer_reviews.title: Float designed correctly
customer_reviews.text: Air tubes are not connected to the float base so no stretching or tearing. Love this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Floats
customer_reviews.text: We gave these to friends with a pool who have been frustrated about floats not lasting. They used them the entire summer and loved them. The fabric was comfortable and the cushions were easy to blow up. The only complaint was that they were a little short for people over about 5'8 to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Suedkamp

customer_reviews.title: my perfect pool raft
customer_reviews.text: This is all you need to relax in your pool. Stay cool and wet with this. Best part, takes very little room to store even inflated!
customer_reviews.author: Rick J

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is comfy and fun! Really enjoy taking it to the pool. I don’t know how it would work with current but I really love it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: We did not have any success with this product. After finally getting the tubes to fit we only git to enjoy them one time and they deflated immediately after. We bought two of them because they are very comfortable in the pool but unfortunately they did not last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Noodz
customer_reviews.text: Had a lovely Catskills trip with some friends and brought these along for the inevitable lake lounging. I was a bit worried that they would be better suited for a pool - but they worked amazingly! Super easy to pack when they're deflated and light to carry along for a bit of trek along a rocky trail. Also easy and fast to assemble once you grab a sandy spot to plop down and set up for a day in nature.
customer_reviews.author: evita

customer_reviews.title: Made well and easy to put together. Comes with a pump .I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy to put together.and how comfy it is ... I am glad I got 2 so I can use 1 without feeling like I need to share it.. Great to float around in and very durable ...
customer_reviews.author: The Duke's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: given as a gift---used on an international trip. made it back home.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Pump is crap. Float is great!
customer_reviews.text: Pump arrived with a hole in it. Had to blow up by mouth! Great lung workout!
customer_reviews.author: P Solo

customer_reviews.title: Packs easily and lightweight water raft
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the product but company resolved and am HAPPY with the purchase. Love how nice it packs in suitcase. Would recommend to anyone that travels and looking for a raft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it i payed more than I wanted but it came quickly
customer_reviews.author: sue w

customer_reviews.title: The design is great, its a good pool float
customer_reviews.text: The design is great, its a good pool float. Unfortunately the second one I ordered split down the seam the first day of use so I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm 128lb and this float works just fine! I can stay cool and relax in the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Okay and met needs.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered came incomplete but the replacement was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tbird

customer_reviews.title: Great float
customer_reviews.text: Great pool float. This holds up my head and feet just like I needed to float in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was like my old one. Made od foam. But instead it is cheep blowup tubes. I will be getting foam to fill it
customer_reviews.author: Ikeman10

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. However Hurricane Irma cancelled my trip that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. However Hurricane Irma cancelled my trip that I bought it for. Don't know if I will get a chance to try it before cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly put together
customer_reviews.text: Was comfortable for the 20 minutes of use it got until it ripped and the inflatable head rest was. The seems just falling out. POORLY put together.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I think it will last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Pink
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and well packaged for what it is; I was actually surprised by the quality. Only beef is that it's a little short for me. I'm 6'1" and it's fine to sit in, but a little short to really stretch out as you would do, in a hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Camperbrah

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Got this, one of floaties didn't hold air. They sent another one, and the OTHER floatie did same thing. After 2 weeks, seam started ripping. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great size and love the versatility of the float
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for the lake and one for the pool....absolutely love the size. Fits easily in my car. It doesn’t hold water like some floats or take time to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Buskill

customer_reviews.title: Best pool chair EVER!
customer_reviews.text: It fits everyone and is much more comfortable than an other pool chair! I have tried many and this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Moorehouse

customer_reviews.title: To Short
customer_reviews.text: The float is ok but pretty short so you can only sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hammock part great, pillows rip
customer_reviews.text: One of the inflatable pillows ripped immediately on the seam so I shoved a noodle folded in half into the holes on one side and it works fine. Very comfy, perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Terry M.

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the pool lounger was not complete as it was missing the second white inflatable. That means the entire float is useless without the second piece. I would like to return it unless I can get the missing inflatable.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Painter

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this worked as well as it could. If the inflatable tubes were bigger, I think it would provide better flotation. There is space in the sleeve for them to accommodate a large tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: The hammock part looks like it would be real nice but I did not receive the air bladders or the pump. So I was not able to use it on the trip to the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dog float!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog LOVES this hammock float. Holds up well. Material thick and durable enough to withstand her claws. I like the float, too, but our retriever has claimed it as her own!
customer_reviews.author: caryn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present and they were finally able to use it today. The tubes immediately deflated and would not stay sealed. It also did not provide enough flotation to keep an average person afloat after they tunes were taped shut. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try it...you’ll like it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted....makes for total relaxation in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Rob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Float!
customer_reviews.text: This float is really great not just for the price but for comfort. It is nice to be able to float in the water and not just be on top of the water. Very relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Kre8tiv7

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. But, your head is in the water. Didn't necessarily want that to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Get a better inflator.
customer_reviews.text: The portable inflator broken after one use. I didn’t have the breathe to blow up the pontoons.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great float!
customer_reviews.text: Great float and easily fits into my Camelback for hiking to local watering holes. Perfect for my pool, too! I like how I can sit in a way that I don't get my hair wet if I want.
customer_reviews.author: somthnclever

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t include a float for one end!! Sent it back!!
customer_reviews.author: QuiltingSister

customer_reviews.title: looks good not so good
customer_reviews.text: the product was cheap in workmanship and fell apart when we were assembling it
customer_reviews.author: ALLEN B UYENO

customer_reviews.title: They float great, but on second use
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them. They float great, but on second use, the stitching blew out on one of them. Not sure if my sewing machine will handle that fabric. Disappointed about that.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with air pump
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the more expensive one because it looked like it came with air pump. I no happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea horrible product!!!! Save your money. All of the tubes had holes in them. I patched them and a new hole showed up, not worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it perfect to relax in the water with it
customer_reviews.author: brenda jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Opened the package to find a hole in one of the tubes, please replace the tube.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for our vacation in Aruba, very disappointed when we opened it up as we were getting ready for the beach, found a hole, the other one works great, it would of been nice to have both of them so my husband could enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has holes
customer_reviews.text: One of the floatie things had a hole. Tried to patch it but it still doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product very much!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. I live close to the bay and after a long day at work I can relax in the lounger in the bay
customer_reviews.author: marijke

customer_reviews.title: Attn Seller**** need replacement inner tube
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but one of the smaller inner tubes already won’t hold air. Requesting replacement tube and I will change rating to 5 star
customer_reviews.author: amy gronley

customer_reviews.title: Best Pool Float Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this so can’t say how well it will hold up but this is the most comfortable pool float that lets you be partially submerged into the water. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by how much I love this float!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate & extremely comfortable. Great value for price!
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: The seams popped the first time we put it in ...
customer_reviews.text: The seams popped the first time we put it in the water. I can re-sew it but shouldn't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Neata

customer_reviews.title: good concept, awkward to blow up & put together
customer_reviews.text: good concept, awkward to blow up & put together. This was not great for travel. I'll use it somewhere I don't have to pack it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bromenschenkel

customer_reviews.title: Would not suggest ordering
customer_reviews.text: would not order again. Had only one inflatable pillow in box and the air pump did not function at all
customer_reviews.author: Myra L Story

customer_reviews.title: It came with a hole in one of the floats.
customer_reviews.text: When I was inflating it I noticed that one of the floats had a hole in it. The hole was on the seem and it was impossible to fix.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless
customer_reviews.text: My pool hammock arrived without the air pillows and no air pump, making this a completely useless purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shazell212

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They are easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are easy to inflate, easy to use and easy to store. I will be buying a few more for next year. It's the perfect float.
customer_reviews.author: PB Max

customer_reviews.title: we had to super glue it
customer_reviews.text: The seam was wide open ... we had to super glue it ...
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Need to purchase pump separately
customer_reviews.text: No pump was included in the package. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Emily K Carr

product_meta.title: OUTERDO Water Hammock Pool Lounger Float Hammock Inflatable Rafts Swimming Pool Air Lightweight Floating Chair Compact and Portable Swimming Pool Mat for Adults and Kids
feature_bullets: ★VERY COMPACT & EASY TO STORE: OUTERDO Water Hammock Lounger is foldable and compact, you can inflate and deflate the water hammock quickly and easily, Just roll it up for easy storage or tote around when needed. You can take it on a journey.

★KEEP YOUR BODY COOL: OUTERDO Inflatable Rafts allows the middle of your body to stay cool by soaking in the water while keeping your head and knee afloat. You can float on water, luxuriate in the sunshine, feel the cool world, enjoy and relax in this wonderful moment.

★COMFPRTABLE&NO HARM: This pool float is ergonomic design and it is covered with nylon fabric, it provides plenty of support and an abundance of comfort. They are no smell and non-toxic, safe and no harm to your health. You can enjoy parent-child time with your kids in the swimming pool, recommended that children use be accompanied by adults.

★HAVE A GREAT LOAD CAPACITY: You have no need to worry about the weight limit, it will handle up to 250 pounds although the lightweight. In addition, the uninflated folded size can be 10*7in, which can save much space when not in use. Suitable for family leisure, swimming pool and vacation travel.

★WHAT WILL YOU GET: You will get a pool hammock float in a package. OUTERDO floating pool chair comes with 1 year 100% Satisfaction Service.OUTERDO is dedicated to addressing any product & service issues and committed to delivering a 5-star experience for all your customers. (Attention: Genuine OUTERDO water hammock only sales from KelvinMall.)
